title: Big Names from the Big Game in Miami
itunes:title: Big Names from the Big Game in Miami
description:
NFL Hall of Fame running back Jerome Bettis talks about how he got the nickname “the bus” and shares his thoughts on the lack of diversity among NFL head coaches. Super Bowl winner Justin Tuck explains how he handled the pressure of playing for the New York Giants. Devon Kennard talks about being nominated for the Walter Payton Man of the Year Award. They all joined the show from the site of Super Bowl LIV in Miami.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
